bibl.title: Reimagining Posidippus.
bibl.note: Contribution inédite. - "Faced with the sudden quadrupling of his oeuvre, it makes sense to step back for a moment and reevaluate our view of the poet or, better, reimagine him. Who was this Posidippus?"

bibl.title: Peter BING, The Scroll and the Marble. Studies in Reading and Reception in Hellenistic Poetry

bibl.seg: Peter BING, The Scroll and the Marble. Studies in Reading and Reception in Hellenistic Poetry (Ann Arbor, 2009) pp. 177-193.

Contribution inédite. - "Faced with the sudden quadrupling of his oeuvre, it makes sense to step back for a moment and reevaluate our view of the poet or, better, reimagine him. Who was this Posidippus?"
